cookieConsent.description:
We use necessary cookies for essential site functionality.

Accept Necessary: Only anonymous analytics are collected to improve our dev tools — no personal data is collected.

Accept All: Grants all optional cookies, including analytics and additional features.
cookieConsent.title: Cookies, But Make ’Em Anonymous

dataFormatConverter.description: Convert between JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, and CSV.
dataFormatConverter.invalidCsvData: CSV format only supports an array of objects with primitive values. Nested objects or arrays are not supported.
dataFormatConverter.invalidIniData: INI format only supports flat key-value pairs or arrays of primitive values. Nested objects are not supported.
dataFormatConverter.invalidTomlData: TOML format only supports objects with string keys and primitive or nested object values. Arrays or primitive top-level values are not supported.
dataFormatConverter.invalidXmlData: XML format only supports objects as root. Nested arrays or primitives as root are not supported.
dataFormatConverter.meta.description: Convert data effortlessly between JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, CSV, INI, and more.
dataFormatConverter.meta.title: {appName} | Data Format Converter
dataFormatConverter.name: Data Format Converter
dataFormatConverter.parseError: Failed to parse input. Please check the syntax of your data.
dataFormatConverter.serializeError: Failed to convert data. Please check the target format requirements.

dataSizeConverter.name: Data Size Converter

home.hero.heading: The Ultimate Developer Toolkit
home.hero.paragraph: Fast, reliable, and privacy-first utilities for conversions, encoding, hashing, and more — all in one place.
home.hero.tagline: Unlike most “built by dev, for devs”, these tools just “work”.
home.meta.description: A modular, privacy-first developer toolbox designed for fast, efficient, and easy-to-use utilities in one unified platform.
home.meta.title: {appName}
home.name: {appName}
home.philosophies.consistentUX.descripti: Every tool behaves predictably — no quirks, no surprises, just a smooth, frustration-free workflow.
home.philosophies.consistentUX.title: Consistent UX
home.philosophies.essentialsOnly.descrip: Just the essentials. Multiple redundant tools replaced by a single, flexible utility for every core task.
home.philosophies.essentialsOnly.title: Essentials Only
home.philosophies.standardOfExcellence.d: Most dev tools claim “built by developer, for developers.” This one delivers on that promise.
home.philosophies.title: The Core Philosophies
home.philosophies.zeroLecture.descriptio: You already know the fundamentals. No explanations, no “how-to” guides — just ready-to-use tools.
home.philosophies.zeroLecture.title: Zero Lecture Policy
home.philosophies.zeroSeo.description: No clutter, no filler text, no SEO farming — just a clean, intuitive interface built for speed and focus.
home.philosophies.zeroSeo.title: Zero SEO Bloat
home.why.problem: Most dev utilities are cluttered, confusing, and chronically inconsistent!
home.why.solution: This toolkit fixes the chaos — it is purpose-built and grounded in principles that matter most.
home.why.title: Why This Toolkit

privacy.changes.text: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We encourage you to review this page periodically to stay informed about any changes.
privacy.changes.title: Changes to This Policy
privacy.cookies.text: Google Analytics uses cookies to collect minimal, anonymous usage data. No cookies are used for advertising, and no personal information is collected or shared.
privacy.cookies.title: Cookies
privacy.dataCollection.text:
We collect minimal analytics data to improve the experience, including:
  • Page views and navigation events
  • Query parameters from URLs
  • Event interactions you trigger (e.g., button clicks)
This data is used solely for understanding usage patterns and improving features. We do not store any personal information or link data to individual users.
privacy.dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
privacy.meta.description: Learn how {appName} protects user privacy and handles data responsibly.
privacy.meta.title: {appName} | Privacy
privacy.name: {appName}
privacy.security.text: All analytics data is handled securely, and any information you enter in text fields remains entirely in your browser. No personal information is collected or transmitted.
privacy.security.title: Security
privacy.subtitle: Here’s what we track and how we handle your data.
privacy.thirdParties.text: Analytics are handled by Vercel & Google Analytics, which receives only the minimal usage data described above. We do not share any personal information with third parties.
privacy.thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
